alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and Washington Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Vernon to 11 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Orange Hill, Whitehead Crossroads, Bruce, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow and Sunny Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
